about.title: About Me
about.description: Front-End Developer with 7+ years of experience building fast, responsive, and scalable web applications, primarily using React and Next.js. I focus on clean architecture, performance optimization, and creating smooth, intuitive user experiences. During the first four years of my career, I worked with .NET and SQL, which gave me strong backend understanding. This background helps me approach frontend development with better structure, efficiency, and clearer integration with backend systems.

positron.title: Frontend Developer
positron.description: Positron Pay operates in the field of payment and financial services, offering solutions such as electronic wallets, credit purchases, and installment-based payments. Its main goal is to simplify financial services for users.

prima.title: Frontend Developer
prima.description: This company operates in real estate, offering professional services in property sales and marketing, with a focus on delivering a smooth and reliable buying experience for clients.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
